text: tatha allaah ne do vyaktiyon ka udaaharan diya hai; donon mein se ek goonga hai, vah kisee cheez ka adhikaar nahin rakhata, vah apane svaamee par bojh hai, vah use jahaan bhejata hai, koee bhalaee nahin laata. to kya vah aur jo nyaay ka aadesh deta ho aur svayan seedhee[1] raah par ho, baraabar ho jaayenge
